name: VegeCloud
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: veggie cloud
des:
The VegeCloud Skill allows you to connect to your VegeCloud account and easily retrieve information on your configured sensors and hubs. Moreover, if you have any configured relay controllers hooked up to your account, you can easily schedule for them to turn on or off (i.e. turn on/off your sprinklers).

Features Include:
- Listing all of your configured VegeCloud.com sensors
- Filtering your sensor list by location and/or type
- Getting specific data on a sensor by asking about it by its name
- Fetching a quick run down of all your sensor's data by saying "sensor report"
- Scheduling a relay controller to turn on or off
- And More!

*Note: in order to get the most out of this skill, you will need to have a VegeCloud account and configure a device. Visit VegeCloud.com for more information on how to get started, or check out this video tutorial: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6wZQ0n8itZY
